info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Graham County through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Andrews, or 10 miles southwest of Town Of Santeetlah, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Graham County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
